title: [Lore Sketches] Boram Darkwill, the Antecedent.
body:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BcuCbUMnbbr/?taken-by=cartoonists_workshop

_In Noxus we have our own brand of diplomacy, shake with your right hand but hold a rock in your left._

replies.body: that is really good. I like the shading on the arm rests of the throne, the pauldron detail, and the stone cracks.

Armour was a huge issue for me. I spent a long time thinking about, what would the former Grand General of Noxus look like? So my focus was try to accurately capture the lore history and aesthetics of Boram + the society/culture he comes from.

If Boram is the sovereign head of an army empire, then he would probably be a decorated war hero himself. Using recent and old examples of Noxian armour I had to chose between designing a really decorative outfit or something more practical with only hints of regal. I finalized a totally unique outfit with a combination of decorative and practical attire.

 [Denethor II](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ePME1xcaR7o) from LotRs was the base of my inspiration for this character.
